DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Study Behavioral Teacher Program Targeting ADHD Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Most behavioral teacher program involve intensive expensive teacher training health care specialist , may limit successful large-scale implementation . This behavioral program , contrary , involve self-containing manual require expert training order increase likelihood successful implementation ( proven effective ) . The aim investigate program 's effect behavioral , socio-emotional school function primary school child . Methods : Children ADHD symptom randomly assign school level intervention condition ( receive program 18 week ) control group ( receive program allow receive care usual ) . Measures assess program 's effectiveness : - Strengths Weaknesses ADHD-symptoms Normal Behavior , - Strengths Difficulties Questionnaire - Social Skills Rating Scale - Spence Children 's Anxiety Scale - Classroom Observation Code - Actigraphy - Sociometric measure ( peer nomination peer rating ) - Dutch arithmetic test ( Tempo-Test-Rekenen ) - read test ( Drie-Minuten-Toets ) write test ( PI-dictee ) . Additional measure : - Wechsler Intelligence Scale Children ( Block Design Vocabulary ; use estimate IQ ) ; - Sensitivity Punishment Sensitivity Reward Questionnaire several neuropsychological computer task
